title: Maynard James Keenan
summary: Maynard James Keenan (born James Herbert Keenan; April 17, 1964) is an American vocalist , songwriter, musician, record producer, actor, and winemaker. He is best known as the singer and primary lyricist of the rock band Tool, with whom he has released five studio albums, A Perfect Circle, with whom he has released four studio albums, and Puscifer, with whom he has released four studio albums.
